org.easylibs.options

Interface PropertyOption

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Option<java.lang.String>

    public interface PropertyOption
extends Option<java.lang.String>
    Property option that gets its name and maps its value to a java Properties object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Option<?>> listOptions(java.util.Properties properties)
      Create a list of options for each property found in the suplied Properties object.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.easylibs.options.Option

        getName, getOptionalValue, getValue, isMatched, isUnmatched, max, min, of, of, of, ofOptional, ofOptional, onMatch

    • Method Detail

      • listOptions

        static java.util.List<Option<?>> listOptions(java.util.Properties properties)
        Create a list of options for each property found in the suplied Properties object. Each property key becomes an option. When option value is set, it is also set within the container properties object for that same key.
        Parameters:
        properties - the java properties to scan for option names and where the option values will be stored
        Returns:
        a new list of property based options
